welcome.title: Welcome to StyleAI
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-Powered Accessible Style Assistant
welcome.description: Discover outfits that celebrate your unique style and accessibility needs. Upload your photo or describe your preferences to get personalized outfit recommendations.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Tell us about yourself to get personalized recommendations
personalInfo.name: Name
personalInfo.helpsPerfectStyles: This helps us create the perfect styles for you
personalInfo.usesProsthetic: Do you use a prosthetic limb?

imageSetup.title: Upload Your Photo
imageSetup.subtitle: Upload a photo to get AI-powered outfit recommendations
imageSetup.chooseMethod: Choose how you'd like to provide your image for personalized styling. Our AI will create beautiful looks just for you.
imageSetup.privacyDescription: Your image is processed temporarily and automatically deleted

outfitGeneration.title: Generating Your Perfect Outfit
outfitGeneration.subtitle: Our AI is analyzing your preferences and creating personalized recommendations
outfitGeneration.designingOutfits: Our AI is designing outfits that celebrate your unique style
outfitGeneration.personalizedOutfits: We've created {count} personalized outfits just for you

results.title: Your Style Recommendations
results.subtitle: Here are personalized outfits curated just for you
results.celebratingBeauty: Celebrating your unique beauty and style
results.confidenceMessage: Your appearance reflects strength, but your true beauty comes from within. Keep shining!
results.downloadDescription: Your personalized look is being saved to your device.
results.improveFuture: This helps us improve future recommendations.

community.title: Community Hub
community.subtitle: Connect, share, and inspire with the adaptive fashion community

shopping.title: Shopping Integration
shopping.subtitle: Discover adaptive fashion and build your perfect wardrobe

wardrobe.description: Organize your clothes and plan outfits

dashboard.readInspiring: Read inspiring stories from our community

messages.elegantProfessional: Elegant professional look with adaptive design
messages.comfortableEveryday: Comfortable everyday style that celebrates you
messages.activeWear: Active wear designed for your lifestyle
messages.beautyHighlights: This style beautifully highlights your confident personality!
messages.colorsComplement: The colors in this outfit perfectly complement your natural radiance.
messages.showcasesStyle: This look showcases your unique sense of style and grace.
messages.lookStunning: You look absolutely stunning in this thoughtfully designed ensemble.
messages.celebratesIndividuality: This outfit celebrates your individuality and inner strength.

privacy.privacyNotice: Images are processed locally and temporarily. Never stored or shared.
privacy.inspirationalQuote: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
